Title: Enacts the "get congestion pricing right act"
Summary: Enacts the "get congestion pricing right act"; directs the MTA to allocate $45 million to the MTA's bus system to increase frequency and reliability; directs the MTA to allocate $45 million to expand the fare-free bus pilot program within NYC; requires reporting on such investments.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-n, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to enacting the "get congestion pricing right act"
